<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update values for newly added fields on existing records.</description>
        <name>SPO Dictionary Changes (Aug 2023)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Update values for new fields purchase order number and order created on Service acknowledgement task.
function updateFieldsOnAcknowledgementTask() {
    var taskGr = new GlideRecord('sn_shop_acknowledgement_task');
    var query = 'purchase_orderISNOTEMPTY';
    taskGr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    taskGr.query();
    while (taskGr.next()) {
        taskGr.setValue('purchase_order_number', taskGr.purchase_order.number);
        taskGr.setValue('order_created', sn_shop.SpendCommonUtil.getLocalDateFromDateTimeInUserFormat(new GlideDateTime(taskGr.purchase_order.created)));
        taskGr.update();
    }
}

updateFieldsOnAcknowledgementTask();]]></script>
